title: Simon Cowell keeps up the health streak as celebrates 60 with birthday bike ride
text:
Happy family (Picture: MEGA)

Simon Cowell was seen soaking up the Los Angeles sun as he biked with his family as he celebrates his 60th birthday today.

The Britain’s Got Talent judge was all smiles as he enjoyed a bike ride with his partner Lauren Silverman, her 13-year-old son Adam and their son Eric along the beach in California.

The 60-year-old wore white shoes and a pair of grey shorts, paired with dark sunglasses as he cycled. He appeared so relaxed that the usually surly talent show judge even grinned at the paparazzi taking pictures of the family outing.

Simon turns 60 years old today (Picture: MEGA)

Lauren appeared equally relaxed in khaki coloured trousers and a grey top, whilst young Adam donned a Comme Des Garcon Play t-shirt and Eric, a blue t-shirt and florescent helmet.

All-in-all it was a casual pre-birthday outing for the family. Simon Cowell turns 60 years old today and in an effort to stay healthy, the TV judge decided to go vegan, cutting dairy, added sugar, bread, gluten and meat from his diet.

He’s so dedicated to his new lifestyle that he doesn’t even intend to have a birthday cake, saying, ‘No cakes. There will not be a birthday cake’.

The vegan diet was to help him keep up with his son (Picture: MEGA)

A super fancy fruit salad, then?

Speaking on Ellen DeGeneres about it, he said: ‘I went to see this doctor in London. We did some tests. And then a month later he said, “You have the worst diet I’ve ever met from any patient.

‘So I went, “Okay, out of the smoking, the drinking, and diet, what do I have to drop?”

‘It was easier than I thought, and part of the reason I did it was because of Eric. I realised if I didn’t sort myself out physically, I wouldn’t be able to catch up with him.

‘Because the minute he gets up to the minute he goes to sleep…their energy, you forget, at five years old, is phenomenal’.

Happy Birthday, SiCo!
